Uses of Class
org.xlattice.httpd.HttpMessage

  • Packages that use HttpMessage 
    Package Description
    org.xlattice.httpd  

    • Uses of HttpMessage in org.xlattice.httpd

      Subclasses of HttpMessage in org.xlattice.httpd 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpRequest
      If the version is 0.9, an HTTP request consists only of a single line without a version number.
      class  HttpResponse
      If the version is 0.9, an HTTP response consists only of an entity.
      Methods in org.xlattice.httpd with parameters of type HttpMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void HttpParser.collectEntity(HttpMessage message, java.nio.ByteBuffer inBuf)
      Collect the entity from the ByteBuffer, given its length in contentLength.
      protected void HttpParser.collectHeaders(HttpMessage msg, java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
      Enter with the cursor (offset) positioned just beyond the end of the first line of an HTTP message.
